about_the_game:
Can you escape before the facility self-destructs?

Robots, cameras and turrets will try and stop you. Be quiet, they have very good hearing!

Hide, sneak and use abilities like invisibility and EMP blasts to get out alive.

Equip a chargeable laser gun, inspired by Another World, to sneak attack, place shields and blast fortifications.

Find loot and hackable computers to extend the self-destruction timer and unlock each floor.

Procedurally generated floors allow for endless replayability.

3 difficulty levels, none are easy! Can you get all 3 trophies?

Made for VR but supports non-VR. Vulkan-compatible graphics card required.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Vulkan-supported distribution
  • Processor: Intel i5 or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Vulkan compatible 3D accelerated
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Beep Boop
  • VR Support: None

name: System Escape

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10+
  • Processor: Intel i5 or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Vulkan compatible 3D accelerated
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Beep boop
  • VR Support: OpenXR. Standing or Room Scale
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10+
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590+ / AMD FX 8350+ for VR
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060 (or equivalent) for VR
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • VR Support: OpenXR with SteamVR as runtime

short_description: Can you escape this difficult underground facility? Robots listen for your every move and cameras monitor sensitive areas. You'll find a utility device and laser gun, but being stealthy will be your best chance at staying alive! Made for VR, but supports non-VR play too.
